Title: Requires the department of criminal justice services to monitor desk appearance tickets and report on the rate which principals appear in court on such tickets
Summary: Requires the department of criminal justice services to monitor desk appearance tickets and report on the rate which principals appear in court on such tickets.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring the department of criminal justice services to monitor desk appearance tickets and report on the rate which principals appear in court on such tickets
